title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, July 15, 2020
description: It's the birthday of novelist and philosopher Iris Murdoch (1919-1999), who won the Booker Prize in 1978 for “The Sea, the Sea.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of novelist and philosopher Iris Murdoch (1919-1999), who won the Booker Prize in 1978 for “The Sea, the Sea.”
